chapters.title: Prologue: Deceptive Appearances
chapters.info: Kalyan Ramsin, p. 21 (8)—One of Tenobia's uncles. He is scarred and grizzled, has a face like an eagle, and thick mustaches. He has an eye for Ethenielle, but she has not decided whether she should take notice of it yet. See also Bashere, Davram t'Ghaline; Kazadi, Tenobia si Bashere; Materasu, Ethenielle Kirukan.
